message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for both of us!  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe we can come to a better agreement. I am willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for the counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit more to $10,500. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's try to make this work!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
